div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 11, 1928. A NEW COURSE IN ENGLISH OFFEREDThe Oldest and Largest School of English Opens New Classes (Announcement)

body.p: New classes, both day and evening, have begun. Lessons are from one until three o'clock in the afternoon and seven to nine in the evening. Reading, writing and speaking English are taught by the latest methods. A single course lasts four months. Lessons are explained in Polish. For further information please call in person.
